attributes.additional_details: Any person convicted of criminal acts during the current London riots should clean their mess and repair or build the damage they made under supervision as long as it takes ( for these people prison is a holiday camp they learn new things and tax payer finance that) . ANY BODY CONVICTED OF ANY CRIMINAL ACT SHOULD HAVE NO HUMAN RIGHT AT ALL FOR EVER .( NO HUMAN RIGHT FOR CRIMINAL AS THEY ARE NOT HUMAN )
